name: Painter's Madness
description:
In this game you embody a painting drone developed by the 60S painting corporation your goal is to paint the highest number of houses according to customers demands without making mistakes

But be carefull you only have 60 seconds to do it this is company policies 

CONTROLS :

  • Z  :  Forward
  • S  :  Backward
  • Q  :  Left
  • D  :  Right
  • Space  :  Paint the house

this is my first solo game jam so feel free to leave a comment on how i could improve

Hope you enjoy and have fun playing this game

Ps : there is 2 hidden  ending messages try finding them. Little clue : they are unlock using the satisfaction counters
